financials.summary: Tata Consultancy Services Limited provides information technology (IT) and IT enabled services in the Americas, Europe, India, and internationally. The company provides TCS ADD, a suite of AI powered life sciences platforms; TCS BaNCS, a financial services platform; TCS BFSI Platforms, a cloud-native, as-a-service digital ecosystem for insurers and financial firms; TCS Chroma, a cloud-based human resource management system platform; TCS Customer Intelligence & Insights, an AI-driven customer analytics and real-time CDP solution; TCS ERP on Cloud, an SAP platform as a service; ignio, a cognitiv...
